recommendation: Provide visible link text or an accessible name via aria-label or aria-labelledby. (WCAG 2.1 SC 2.4.4)
algorithm: Flags links or role=link elements that have no accessible name after checking text, aria-label/labelledby, title, or nested image alt.
algorithm_advanced: Evaluates and role=link nodes; requires text, aria-label/labelledby, title, or child to avoid issue.
